page.title: 14Children's Games in Dale
page.content: Children enjoy playing on the beaches. They build castles,make dams,catch crabs and fish and play football and cricket.Sometimes they have barbecues. They play games in the playground at school,like hopscotch,skipping,catchy, hide and seek,mothers and fathers and football or rounders.Outside their houses they play on their B.M.X bikes and go-karts.They do skids and wheelies.Some children have swings in their gardens.Others can go to the woods and make dens, climb trees or make swings.There is no children's playing field,so sometimes they play in the meadow.They fly boomerangs and kites,play with bows and arrows and have games of football and cricket. Indoors, they have toys and electronic games,dolls,T.V.,books and 'Let's Pretend' games.
